name: Happy's Harvest
description:
Gather resources to survive and keep the nightmares at bay! 

 Are YOU enough of a pro gamer to survive the lurking terror in Happy Harvest™?!

Spend the day time collecting wood, stone and fish to build camps and torches that repel the horrors that appear at night time. With the latest in graphic technology and unlimited gameplay fun to be had, this is the present all kids want under the tree this Christmas!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Scroll Wheel - Swap Active Tool
